markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ghostly Grasp (Ghost)](/Feats.aspx?ID=3499) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 47

**Archetype** [Ghost](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=177)

**Prerequisites**
[Ghost Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3496)

</column>

---

Your control over your ghostly form grows. You gain the [advanced undead benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=1695) and can interact with physical objects, with limits. You can attempt Strength-based skill checks against physical creatures and objects. You can Interact with physical objects, but the action has no effect unless you succeed at a DC 20 [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) or DC 20 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) check.
name: Ghostly Grasp (Ghost)

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 6" pfs="Standard" > Ghostly Grasp (Ghost) Source Book of the Dead pg. 47 Archetype Ghost Prerequisites Ghost Dedication --- Your control over your ghostly form grows. You gain the advanced undead benefits and can interact with physical objects, with limits. You can attempt Strength-based skill checks against physical creatures and objects. You can Interact with physical objects, but the action has no effect unless you succeed at a DC 20 Athletics or DC 20 Thievery check.
